TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
do nothing

 

What is air

It surrounds every living being, it penetrates us.

 

wot am i doing

You're doing everything.

Whats 2+2?

Fish. DUUUUH!

If a bird can fly, then could a fly bird if it tried really hard?

Depends if it is an African or European fly.

 

How many fries could a fishfry fish if a fishfry could fry fish?

Umm......calamari? YES...CALAMARI!

What is what?

It is… ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED!!1!

Can donkeys become sentient?

only if they eat pumpkins on christmas!

how do i turn on a fan?

Play his favorite song.

Why were they called Tudors and not Oneders???

Copyright reasons.

What is this thing? -> #

Result of using a hammer.

Why is space sooooooo vast?

why space is so vast

you have now idea. ?

Edited January 9, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''

"now" idea has become "then" idea. You are hopelessly stuck in the past.

 

Where is tuna?

The cat ate it.

How do I make bacon?

Flamethrower.

 

Doughnuts?

No.

Can I have an octochoron plz?

You can get that at any shoreside diner, or at the frozen-section of inland markets.


Could I globally tax sunlight if I can prove that I started the solar fusion?

Yes. If you proved that anime is better than the speed of light

Can i be able to physically travel to the inside of a Supernova ( Dying is inevitable )

Of course you can. Just escape the solar system, then use a really big spaceship to go to a big star that might go supernova soon, then crash into it and hope it blows at the time you get there.

How many seconds in a liter?

0.42 in average. A bit less with american accent, a bit more with cockney.

Where the heck is my lighter? Can't find it since like minutes.

Up your nose!

 

 

Why can't I find a good LF/O mix balance for a Nuke/RAPIER combo?

Modern technology it too complicated. You should try to design spaceboats with coal and steam in mind. You could also try nailing a long plastic sheet to clouds, so you ascent profile stay the same if you follow that.

 

Why does my dog afraid of a vacuum-cleaner while he is perfectly calm while I use a hairdrier on him?

Edited January 11, 2016 by Evanitis

Because dogs

 

Why is everything so complicated?

Because if it we're simple, humans would be even more OP.

Why are birds not dinosaurs?

Cause it would be annoying to wake up to roars and shrieks instead of tweeting. They'd also ruin electric cables upon landing.

Is there a release date for KSP 2 yet?
